title: The Real NCIS
overview: The Real NCIS - The US Department of the Navy is home to one of the top investigative agencies in the world: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service or NCIS. Each 60 minute episode of The Real NCIS will be told from the perspective of Special Agents on the mission of solving the toughest, most compelling cases from NCIS files around the globe. Episodes will feature a wide range of investigative techniques including forensic science, cunning games of strategy, undercover stings, and psychological profiling. The audience shares the highs, lows, and unexpected twists of thrilling real-life investigations. The series will also highlight the special challenges of cold cases, and the dedication of agents who are determined to leave no unsolved case behind.
